citations.narrative:
The records are incomplete. Some of the APHIS forms 7006 are missing or missing information. Records of kittens
born are currently written in a calendar but lack documentation of number born and individual descriptions.
Accurate and organized records are necessary to trace animals in the event of a disease outbreak. The facility shall
make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose the required information.
Correct by: From This Day Forward
Exit interview conducted with Owner.

narrative:
2.75(a)(1)
RECORDS: DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS.
The records are incomplete.  Some of the APHIS forms 7006 are missing or missing information.  Records of kittens
born are currently written in a calendar but lack documentation of number born and individual descriptions. 
Accurate and organized records are necessary to trace animals in the event of a disease outbreak.  The facility shall
make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose the required information.
Correct by:  From This Day Forward
Exit interview conducted with Owner.
